CustomField.description:
Auto generated prefix used in contract number Formula 1: RIGHT(TEXT(YEAR(Contract_EDate__c)), 2) & LEFT(TEXT(Contract_Type__c ), 1) & Contract_BU__r.ISO_Country_Code__c
Formula 2: TEXT(YEAR(Contract_BDate__c)) & '-' & LEFT(TEXT(Contract_Type__c ), 1) & Contract_BU__r.BU_Code__c
CustomField.label: Contract Number Prefix
